name: B.E.E.S.
description:
While the Architecture Manifesto provides long-term principles for our technical architecture, B.E.E.S. is a mnemonic acronym for the 4-pillar architecture strategy that will lead us to our vision: an extensible distibuted system that supports long-term innovative growth.

  1. Boundaries - see 'Blip: Boundaries (domain-driven)'
  2. Extensions - see 'Blip: Extensible Cores'
  3. Events - see 'Blip: Event-driven Architecture'
  4. Standards - see 'Blip: Standards-based Development'

See the Arch B.E.E.S. slides, including speaker notes, for more information.

We are moving forward on all 4 simultaneously through active efforts on our architecture roadmap.
